metadata.title: CVE-2022-0217 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: It was discovered that an internal Prosody library to load XML based onlibexpat does not properly restrict the XML features allowed in parsed XMLdata. Given suitable attacker input, this results in expansion of recursiveentity references from DTDs (CWE-776). In addition, depending on thelibexpat version used, it may also allow injections using XML ExternalEntity References (CWE-611).

criterions.comment: prosody package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
